summary: Junior C++ developer with experience in designing and implementing data structures in C++ (C++98 and C++17), multithreading, and building tools with Docker, Git, and Kubernetes. Proficient in Linux/Unix environments, Qt and Boost, and experience with debugging tools (lldb, valgrind). Strong self-education, documentation, and translation skills.

experience.title: Junior C++ Developer
experience.description: Transferred old data structures to asynchronous implementations; developed dialog windows in Qt and Boost-based components; worked with Docker, Git, Kubernetes; multithreaded programming; Linux/Unix environment; debugging with lldb and valgrind.
